alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jefferson County through 645 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mulga, or near Fairfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Trussville, Gardendale, Irondale, Leeds, Fairfield, Fultondale, Center Point, Pleasant Grove, Clay, Pinson, Tarrant, Adamsville, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Brookside and Mulga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central Alabama.
